name: obsidian-related-notes
description: An Obsidian plugin that suggests related notes using bloom filter similarity

scripts.dev:custom: echo 'Set TARGET_DIRS env var as JSON array of paths' && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build:custom: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && echo 'Set TARGET_DIRS env var as JSON array of paths' && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add src/manifest.json manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prepare-release: npm run validate && npm run build && npm run test:run

author: Oluwasanya Awe
